name: Event Building 4 [Failure]
uniques: Triggers a [Citizens are disatisfied!] event <every [2] turns>

name: Event Building 5 [Success]
uniques: Triggers a [Citizens are disatisfied!] event <upon turn end>

name: Event Building 5 [Testing]
uniques: Triggers a [Citizens are disatisfied!] event <upon turn end> <when below [0] Happiness>

name: Event Building 6 [Testing]
uniques: Triggers a [Citizens are disatisfied!] event <upon turn end> <when between [0] and [-10] Happiness>
